title: Hybrid Blended Learning Design to Improve Engineering Education Satisfaction and Reduce Dropout Rates

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts (middle school education level)
context.additional_context: Most learners are general citizens with high interest in science but no prior experience in engineering, provided with an online learning environment utilizing personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can apply foundational scientific principles for engineering problem-solving with over 80% accuracy
Learners achieve weekly interaction frequency of two or more times with peer learners through online discussions and collaborative activities
Learners maintain learning satisfaction at 4.0/5.0 or higher through weekly 1:1 feedback sessions with instructors
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
